entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Orangeville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:34 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.9°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle before morning. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 5:55 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain showers or drizzle changing to snow late in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 5:55 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 4.
